com.stephanlajaunie.projects.messaging.service.client

Class ClientConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stephanlajaunie.projects.messaging.service.client.ClientConstants

  • public class ClientConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates many of the common client-side logs, messages, prompts, etc that may be used.
    Author:
    slajaunie

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONFIRM_LOGGED_IN
      Prompt indicating that the User is currently logged in
      static java.lang.String HELLO_CMD_STATUS
      Logs that the HELLO test command will be sent to the Server
      static java.lang.String HELP_SCREEN
      The screen that displays in response to a HELP command
      static java.lang.String LOG_CONFIRM_DELETE_ALL_RESP
      Logs that the server sent back a response confirming all messages were deleted
      static java.lang.String LOG_CONFIRM_DELETE_SINGLE_RESP
      Logs that the server sent back a response confirming the specified message was deleted
      static java.lang.String LOG_DELETE_ACTION
      Prompts the user to enter the message number to be deleted, ALL to delete all messages, and CANCEL to exit the operation
      static java.lang.String LOG_DELETE_CONFIRM_ALL
      Prompts the user to confirm the request to delete all messages, prior to sending the command to the server
      static java.lang.String LOG_DELETE_CONFIRM_CANCEL
      Logs that the DELETE command will be sent
      static java.lang.String LOG_DELETE_CONFIRM_ERROR
      Logs that User did not respond to the confirm delete prompt with a valid input
      static java.lang.String LOG_DELETE_CONFIRM_SINGLE
      Prompts the user to confirm the request to delete a specific message, prior to sending the command to the server
      static java.lang.String LOG_DELETE_UNSUCCESSFUL
      Logs that the server sent back a response indicating that it was unable to delete the requested message(s)
      static java.lang.String LOG_FORWARD_ACTION
      Logs that the FORWARD command will be sent
      static java.lang.String LOG_FORWARD_MSG_OPTION
      Prompts the user to enter the messge number of the message to be forwarded
      static java.lang.String LOG_INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS
      Logs that the server sent back a response indicating that the User-specified message number does not exist in the message store
      static java.lang.String LOG_INVALID_OPTION
      Logs that the User did not respond to the message number prompt with a valid input
      static java.lang.String LOG_LOGIN_AUTH_FAIL
      Logs that the server sent back a response indicating that the Username and password were not authenticated successfully
      static java.lang.String LOG_LOGIN_AUTH_SUCCESS
      Logs that the server sent back a response indicating that the Username and password were authenticated successfully
      static java.lang.String LOG_LOGIN_INIT_CONTACT
      Logs that the LOGIN command will be sent to the Server
      static java.lang.String LOG_LOGIN_INVALID_ARG
      Logs that the user entered invalid input for the LOGIN action
      static java.lang.String LOG_MSG_SUCCESS
      Logs that the server sent back a response indicating that it successfully send the requested message
      static java.lang.String LOG_NO_SERVER_RESPONSE
      Logs that the Client did not receive a response from the Server
      static java.lang.String LOG_READ_ACTION
      Logs that the READ command will be sent
      static java.lang.String LOG_READ_ERROR
      Logs that the server sent back a response indicating it was unable to retrieve the requested messages.
      static java.lang.String LOG_RECIP_OPTION
      Prompts the user to enter the recipient of the SEND/FORWARD action
      static java.lang.String LOG_SEND_ACTION
      Logs that the SEND command will be sent
      static java.lang.String LOG_SEND_COMMAND
      Logs the command that will be sent to the server
      static java.lang.String LOG_SEND_MSG_OPTION
      Prompts the user to enter the body of a message to be sent
      static java.lang.String LOG_UNDELIVERABLE_MSG_ERROR
      Logs that the server sent back a response indicating it was unable to deliver the requested message
      static java.lang.String LOG_UNRECOGNIZED_SENT_RESP_ERROR
      Logs that the server sent back a response that was not recognized
      static java.lang.String LS
      The system-dependent line separator String
      static java.lang.String NOT_LOGGED_IN
      Indicates the user has tried to complete an account action (READ,SEND,etc.) without logging in
      static java.lang.String PROGRAM_CONFIRM_CLOSING
      Prompt indicating the Program is exiting
      static java.lang.String PROGRAM_INPUT_ERROR
      Prompt indicating an error reading User input from the console.
      static java.lang.String PROGRAM_INVALID_COMMAND
      Prompt that the User entered a command that was not recognized
      static java.lang.String PROMPT_LOGGED_IN
      Prompt requesting user to enter additional commands, after being authenticated
      static java.lang.String PROMPT_NOT_LOGGED_IN
      The initial prompt upon opening the program, prior to the User being authenticated
